properties.Name: AssetNetPresentValue
properties.Description:
The difference between the present value of cash inflows and the present value of cash outflows. 

NPV is used in capital budgeting to analyze the profitability of an investment or project.

Columns.Name: AssetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Asset.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the Asset NPV is calculated.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the Asset NPV is calculated.

Columns.Name: InvestmentAmount
Columns.Description: The amount invested in the Asset.

Columns.Name: DepreciationOfAssetAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of depreciation for the Asset for the year analyzed.

Columns.Name: TotalDeductionsAmount
Columns.Description: The total deductions taken on the Asset.

Columns.Name: TaxSavingsAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of tax savings calculated for the Asset in the year being analyzed.

Columns.Name: CashOutflowAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of cash outflow calculated for the Asset in the year being analyzed.

Columns.Name: PresentValueAmount
Columns.Description: The present value of the asset for the year being analyzed.

Properties.Description:
The difference between the present value of cash inflows and the present value of cash outflows. 

NPV is used in capital budgeting to analyze the profitability of an investment or project.
